title: STOP selling your book on AMAZON KDP... Do THIS instead
description:
Are you ready to give yourself a big raise today (without using Amazon KDP)? Once I applied this well-kept secret, my passive income quadrupled! 

🔗  Free Book Funnel Worksheet: 
https://fabi.myflodesk.com/bookfunnel

Do you want to take your book sales to the next level and multiply your passive income? Forget Amazon KDP! In this video, I'm going to show you how to create a book funnel that will 4x your earnings and give you complete control over your sales process.
Selling your book on Amazon might seem like the easiest way to make a few bucks, but did you know that Amazon takes a massive cut of your profits? 
And even worse, you're competing against countless other authors in a crowded marketplace where it's tough to stand out.
But fear not! 

By creating a book funnel, you'll be able to attract the right readers and convert them into loyal fans who are eager to buy your future books. Plus, you'll be able to keep more of your earnings and have a direct line of communication with you
tags: how to sell books online for free
how to sell books on amazon
